name: 6THC
goal: Topos is a decentralized financial platform for an inherently decentralized population: migrants.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
financial inclusion
migration policies
development aid
distributed ledger
community driven consensus
shared benefits
integration policies
